alert.note: Alert for Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Perkins, eastern Keith and west central Lincoln Counties through 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/... At 758 PM CDT/658 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles north of Sarben to near Keystone to near Lemoyne. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Paxton, Lemoyne, Keystone, Sarben, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Big Bald Hill, Nevens and Broganville. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 80 and 105. Highway 92 between mile markers 132 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 124 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT/900 PM MDT/ for southwestern Nebraska.
